author: Leigh Ann Caldwell
title: Rep. Justin Amash to decide whether to launch presidential bid 'soon'
description: Rep. Justin Amash is expected to make a decision “soon” on whether he will jump in the race for president his office says, potentially launching the latest attempt by a conservative to challenge President Donald Trump.
content:
WASHINGTON Rep. Justin Amash is expected to make a decision soon on whether he will jump in the race for president his office says, potentially launching the latest attempt by a conservative to challenge President Donald Trump.
